sentence: WSJ Opinion: Stacey Abrams, Voter Suppression and Georgia 2022Play video: WSJ Opinion: Stacey Abrams, Voter Suppression and Georgia 2022 Potomac Watch: Stacey Abrams lost the 2018 Georgia governor's race to republican Brian Kemp, and to this day she's never accepted the result.

title: Tennessees Political Protection Racket
